Edges-Power -- Female Human Seasoned Adventurer
Attributes (8 Points):
Agility: d8 Smarts: d8 Spirit: d6 Strength: d4 Vigor: d10
Attribute Notes: Obese: -1 Strength Step (worn gear)
Skills (14 Points):
Athletics: (agi) d4 Notice: (sma) d4 Shooting: (agi) d4
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4 Occult: (sma) d8 Spellcasting: (sma) d8
Gambling: (sma) d4 Persuasion: (spi) d4 Stealth: (agi) d6
Healing: (sma) d8 Research: (sma) d4 Thievery: (agi) d4
Size: 1
Advances: 4 Improvement Points: 12 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 6; Edge: 4; Skill: 2
Description Notes: Obese: +1 Size
Features
Edges (3 points): Arcane Background (Occultist); Favored Power; Silent Caster Hindrances: Habit; Obese; Pacifist+ Human Abilities: Adaptable
Feature Notes:
Adaptable: +1 Edge Points
Arcane Background (Occultist): Has Corruption+ and Magic features
Habit: Has an irritating but harmless compulsion
Magic: May take edges particular to Arcane Background (Magic)
Combat
Parry: 5 (3) Cover: 4 Toughness: 10 (2) Pace/Run: 5/+d4
Armor: Kevlar Riding Jacket Shield: Riot Shield Weapons: Dagger (d4+d4 R3"); Glock (2d6 R12" AP 1); Mini Crossbow (2d4 R6" AP 1); Unarmed (d4+d0)
Combat Notes:
Obese: -1 Pace/-1 Run Step/+1 Toughness
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +5
Pacifist+: Will not fight living creatures; uses nonlethal methods only in defense
Arcana
Power Count: 5 Power Points: 10
Powers:
Entangle: (2 PP) R8" Restrains target (Raise binds; Athletics or breaking Hardness 5 frees) (+2/+3 PP 2"/3" radius; +2 PP Athletics-2, Hardness 7)
Havoc: (2 PP) R8" Distracts and throws 2d6" creatures in a 2" radius or 9" cone (Strength neg) (+1 PP 3" radius; +1 PP Strength-2)
Lock/Unlock: (1 PP) R8" Inflicts -4 to open on target item (Raise seals shut) or opens target item, ignoring 4 points of penalties (Raise disarms alarms and traps) (+1 PP Alerts self if unlocked)
Common Power Modifiers: +1/+2/+3 PP Armor Piercing; +2 PP Fatigue; +1 PP Glow/Shroud; +2 PP Heavy Weapon; +1 PP Hinder/Hurry; +2 PP Lingering Damage; +1/+2 PP Dbl/Tpl Range; +1 PP Selective
Arcana Notes:
Arcane Background (Occultist): 5 Powers/10 Power Points
Corruption+: Critical failure on arcane skill inflicts additional or increased hindrance until next advance
Favored Power: Ignores 2 points of penalties when casting chosen power
Silent Caster: May use powers w/out speaking
